title: Kidney Stone Management
shortDescription: Diagnosis and minimally invasive treatment for kidney stones.
fullDescription: We evaluate stone composition, provide pain control, and use evidence-based approaches including hydration plans, medical expulsive therapy, and referrals for ESWL/URS when necessary.

title: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Care
fullDescription: Dietary counseling, medication optimization, risk factor control (BP, sugar), and dialysis planning when appropriate. Regular monitoring to slow disease progression.

title: Male Fertility & Andrology
shortDescription: Assessment and treatment for male fertility concerns.
fullDescription: We investigate semen parameters, hormonal profiles, and lifestyle factors. Care plans include medical management, counseling, and referrals for advanced reproductive techniques.

title: Prostate Health
shortDescription: Evaluation and management of BPH and prostate conditions.
fullDescription: Assessment includes symptom scoring, PSA evaluation, imaging when needed, and shared decision-making about medical or procedural interventions.

title: Urinary Tract Infections (UTI)
shortDescription: Timely diagnosis and treatment for UTIs.
fullDescription: We use targeted antibiotic therapy based on local resistance patterns and provide preventive strategies to reduce recurrence.

title: Hypertension & Kidney Risk
shortDescription: Blood pressure optimization for kidney protection.
fullDescription: Medication review, lifestyle guidance, and monitoring to protect kidney function and cardiovascular health.
